it's then best to squeeze your limes so

we'll come back to it later for the
lemongrass peel off the outer layer
first slice off the bottom and then I

then just slice it into strips about
one-inch long for the galangal use about
a thumb-sized

head

just make sure that that heat is off

off now of course one of the most
